summary.experience: Zi Xi Yang's experience appears to be strongly concentrated in Information Technology (mostly Programming) and slightly concentrated in Engineering (mostly Surveying). Zi Xi Yang's experience appears to be entry level, with 6 months of experience.

positions.title: Bruins in Genomics (B.I.G) Research Intern
positions.summary:
Built a Python module for downsampling and feature extraction of neuroimages using scattering
transform methods to quantify the patterns of cell distribution in the brain.


• Implemented machine learning algorithms such as Random Forest and LDA to predict brain
microstructures with 80% accuracy using PyTorch and Scikit-Learn.


• Constructed a pipeline for optimizing and evaluating novel 3D brain image registration methods for
multimodal data, with initial volume overlap of 69.7%.

DeeCamp is a summer AI institute for college students with over 10,000 applicants each year.


• Analyzed multimodal data and performed feature engineering using Python and NumPy.


• Visualized key attributes in the interactions between millions of users and determine feature
combinations for model training using Cytoscape, a software for visualizing complex networks.


• Trained machine learning models to classify fake users for a large multimodal dataset from a
financial platform with precision of 85.1%.
